Text:
Please seed to at least 1.0 ratio so everyone can download the file.

Don't hit and run!...

Thanks for this.

Could you post the specifics of your modifications? Always good to know what you're installing as root, with all sorts o' privileges. Cheers, mate!

@neuromonkey: No mods, mate! Google Play is released as-is for those who can't get it the "normal way" through their devices.

It had been reported to me in the past that Google Play sometimes play up on certain devices without root access if you're not installing GP directly through Google servers. However, I have been able to get this version of GP to install fine without root. I guess the prerequisite requirement was just a precaution in case it doesn't work...
Get updated version of Google Play Store here: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8433618/Google_Play_Store_v4.0.27_Installer
